title: Kids Coding Course
description: Learn the basics of programming and computer science with the Scratch block-based programming language.

title: Kids English Course
description: Everyday English and English for programming. English support for programming courses taught in English. Available as a standalone course or bundled with a programming course.

title: Kids Coding + English Bundle
description: Taking a coding class togther with an English class gives you all the benefits of both and is cheaper than taking each course individually.

title: Private Lesson 4 times a month
description: For one-on-one support with English or programming. Choose the content and pace.

title: Private Lesson 2 times a month
description: For those who would like to study privately but don't have time to study every week.

title: Adult English Group Lesson
description: It's fun to learn English in a group and more affordable than taking private lessons.
